Text: Once Upon a Time, there was a young, Tired Witch. A very grouchy, seclusive, and very, [b]very[/b], Tired Witch.
She was so tired and frumpish because, in her own words, she did not like people. Saying they always got in the way of her very [s]Un[/s]Important work.
That is until one fateful day, when she received a letter saying that she had just inherited a shop close to a quiet little village in the words.
With nothing better to do, the Tired Witch decided to move out towards her recent acquisition, and thus our story begins.
